Description: Rybbon is the all-in-one solution for sending, tracking, and managing digital rewards programs.
Name: Rybbon

Methods.Name: Add Gift Claim (Variable Denomination)
Methods.Description: Creates and sends a gift claim for one or more recipients for gifts with variable denomination.

Methods.Name: Add Gift Claim (Fixed Denomination)
Methods.Description: Creates and sends a gift claim for one or more recipients for gifts with fixed denomination.

Methods.Name: List Campaigns (Fixed Gift Price)
Methods.Description: Retrieves all campaigns available in your account with gifts of fixed denomination.

Methods.Name: List Campaigns
Methods.Description: Retrieves all campaigns available in your account.

Methods.Name: List Campaigns (Variable Gift Price)
Methods.Description: Retrieves all campaigns available in your account with gifts of variable denomination.
